meta.title: Sinkhole & Void Filling Experts | Terratech
meta.description: Terratech specializes in sinkhole and void filling solutions using advanced 3D ground imaging and eco-friendly poly-foam technology for safe and efficient remediation without excavation.

text.subtitle: Rapid, non-invasive stabilization to address subsurface voids before they escalate.

section.description: Sinkholes form when erosion or water movement removes subsurface soil, creating voids beneath the surface. As support is lost, the ground above can settle or collapse without visible warning.
Along with on site assessment and detailed visual observation of the area, Terratech's 3D Scanning techniques and analysis can show advanced warning signs for informed remediation.

stages.label: Early Sinkhole Formation is Invisible
stages.title: Compaction Grouting
stages.text: This technique uses a low-mobility, thick grout injected under high pressure to displace and densify loose granular soils, increase bearing capacity, and fill voids.

stages.label: Progression Increases Risk of Collapse
stages.title: Permeation Grouting
stages.text: This process injects low-viscosity grout into soil without disturbing its natural structure, filling the pores to increase bearing capacity and reduce permeability. It is suitable for granular soils like sand and gravel.

stages.label: Injected Polyurethane Stops Degradation
stages.title: Chemical (polymer) Grouting
stages.text: This involves injecting a chemical solution, such as an expanding polymer or grout, to consolidate or lift concrete slabs and stabilize soil. Expanding polymer fills voids and compacts soil.

points.title: Early Risk Identification
points.description: Identify voids, weak soils, moisture anomalies, and hidden instability early in the process—before they impact budgets or schedules.

points.title: Non-Invasive Assessment
points.description: Scanning is non-invasive and requires no excavation, enabling assessment without shutting down traffic or operations.

points.title: High-Confidence Data
points.description: High-accuracy scans map underground conditions with millimeter-level detail, reducing guesswork and minimizing risk for crews, assets, and adjacent infrastructure.

points.title: Data-Driven Repair Planning
points.description: Accurate subsurface data allows repair plans to be tailored to real site conditions—eliminating costly surprises and ensuring the right solution the first time.

section.description: TerraTech stabilizes subsurface voids and weak soils beneath roadways without excavation, restoring support while keeping the surface intact.
